attributes.action: Reintroduce Physical punshiment in all secondary schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
children today need to understand the difference between acceptable and unacceptable behavior, they need to understand what real respect means, and not the type they learn from rap music or films.
i am sure by reintroducing physical punishment the standard of grades, commitment and attention in school would greatly improve, thus street crime would fall and overall respect in the community would be achieved.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
